channel.title: Helo server keeps loosing connection
channel.description: hey my server keeps saying lost connection whil eim playin and it will relog me and but then it shuts the server down and everyone is loosing they stuff cause they dont get to save. how i stop it.

item.title: Helo server keeps loosing connection
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

1)Maybe your computer is laggy… Delete some stuff you don’t need.
2)Maybe if you use hamachi maybe reboot hamachi , because it keeps losing connection…
3)If you have no-ip I find that laggs… maybe switch to hamachi… http://www.hamachi.cc
4)Maybe someone is clicking too fast on something , or attacking a npc they aren’t suppose to. (crashing the server)

Try to figure out which. ;D

Read full topic
